divs: Sighting Detailsthese craft are readily apparent in the skies above.take out a telescope,there are goldish craft right outside our atmosphere.prepare yourselves,how i dont know yet.will keep you posted while i survey them and surmise their habitual patterns,timelines;and intelligence on them.keep you posted.thanks!
